name: One shape
description:
One Shape is a 2D abstract puzzle where your main goal is to be the last piece standing. Match pieces by shape or color and cleanup the board, but be careful not to run out of moves! 

The project is public to everyone through this link:
https://github.com/brunogbrito/OnlyOneUnit
Feel free to download the project and reach us out if you have any doubts or want to talk about it :)
